trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class is an abstract class used as the base class for all <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols" /> exceptions.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> é uma classe abstrata usada como a classe base para todas as exceções <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> usando o parâmetro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do objeto serializado sobre a exceção sendo gerada.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: As informações contextuais sobre a origem ou o destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified serialization information and streaming contextual information.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> usando as informações de serialização e de contexto de streaming especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, se houver, que gerou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> usando os parâmetros especificados.
